key_features: No experimental_ prefix — streamText and generateText are stable
generateObject and streamObject for structured data generation
StreamData class for appending custom data to streams
Message type for UI chat messages (has .content string property)
generateObject/generateText/streamText/streamObject accept common parameters: model, system, prompt, messages, maxTokens, temperature, etc.
breaking_changes: experimental_ prefix removed from all functions
streamText is now synchronous — do NOT use await
Provider initialization changed to factory pattern
notes: streamText is called WITHOUT await — it returns synchronously
Response method is toDataStreamResponse(), NOT toAIStreamResponse()
Do NOT use experimental_ prefix — functions are stable
Use CoreMessage, not ExperimentalMessage or ModelMessage
Use openai('gpt-4o') from @ai-sdk/openai, not new OpenAI()
Message type has .content (string), NOT .parts (that is v5+)
Use generateObject/streamObject for structured data — NOT Output API (v6+)
chunk.textDelta in fullStream, NOT chunk.text (that is v5+)
system parameter is valid for generateObject, generateText, streamText, and streamObject — it sets the system message for the LLM
